definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
vivid/lively/(of food ingredients) live or fresh
to revive/(lit. and fig.) to come back to life/(religion) resurrection
to provide for/to keep (animals, a family etc)/to raise animals/to feed and clothe/support/the necessities of life/to give birth

sentences.english: A three-year-old girl is now a new living goddess in Nepal.
sentences.chinese: 一名三歲女孩，現在是一個新的活女神在尼泊爾。

sentences.english: He went about the job like a bull in a china shop.
sentences.chinese: 他幹這種活就想公牛進了瓷器店那樣莽撞。

sentences.english: My father is too old to do any work now.
sentences.chinese: 我父親現在太老，幹不動什麼活了。

sentences.english: The unrefined Veratryl alcohol extracted from fresh grape peel by organic solvent could significantly enhance Lip activity.
sentences.chinese: 有機萃取葡萄皮渣粗提藜蘆醇可提高酶活。

sentences.english: It is said that the old tree has stood here two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 據說這棵樹已經在這裏活了兩千年了。

sentences.english: He never makes his brother do heavy work.
sentences.chinese: 他從不讓他弟弟乾重活。

sentences.english: According to his own testimony, he was 197 years old.
sentences.chinese: 根據他自己生前的陳述來看，這位老人活了197歲。

sentences.english: After we’d finished working, we climbed down and picked up our tools.
sentences.chinese: 幹完活後，我們收拾好工具爬下屋頂。

sentences.english: And Serug lived after he begat Nahor two hundred years, and begat sons and daughters.
sentences.chinese: 西鹿生拿鶴之後，又活了二百年，並且生兒養女。

sentences.english: Imagine all the people living life in peace.
sentences.chinese: 想像所有人都活在和平之中。

sentences.english: It's endless work maintaining the building in good repair.
sentences.chinese: 要維持這座大樓完好無損真是個沒完沒了的活。

sentences.english: The nasal vaccine, called FluMist, is made of an attenuated live virus.
sentences.chinese: 稱作流感噴霧的鼻噴霧疫苗由經稀釋的活病毒製成。

sentences.english: Do you get any experience for killing monsters that were resurrected by other monsters?
sentences.chinese: 可以從被複活的怪物身上得到經驗值嗎？

sentences.english: Plasma fibrinogen levels were assayed by tissue thromboplastin.
sentences.chinese: 採用組織凝血活酶法測定血漿纖維蛋白原水平。

sentences.english: The beast preys on living animals.

definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
erhua variant of 幹活|干活[gan4 huo2]
to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
erhua variant of 苦活[ku3 huo2]
to tire oneself out through overwork/to work oneself to death
dead person/(coll.) to die/(of a death) to happen
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
